name: Dean Lofts
bio: DevOps Engineer, Proompter and a big fan of Open Source.

milestones.title: Received the Iraq Medal
milestones.description: Was awarded the Iraq Medal for my service in Iraq as part of Operation Catalyst

milestones.title: Received the Australian Active Service Medal
milestones.description: Was awarded the Australian Active Service Medal for my service in an active warzone as part of Operation Catalyst

milestones.title: Received the Australian Defence Medal
milestones.description: Was awarded the Australian Defence Medal for my service in the Royal Australian Navy

milestones.title: Produced and released my first album JR. - Such Iz Life
milestones.description: I wrote, recorded, produced, mixed and helped master this album with JR.

milestones.title: Produced and released OptiMystic - Day of the Guiding Light
milestones.description: I wrote the music and produced this double album with OptiMystic

milestones.title: Produced and released OptiMystic - Salty Waterz
milestones.description: I wrote the music and produced this album with OptiMystic

milestones.title: Released my first solo album called The Beat Down
milestones.description: I released my first solo album which is a collection of beats of mine from a beat battle

milestones.title: Released an album as a member of the Hip Hop group Protektahz
milestones.description: I wrote the music and produced this album with Protektahz

milestones.title: Produced and released OptiMystic - Salty Waterz 2
milestones.description: I wrote the music and produced this album with OptiMystic

milestones.title: Discovered EddieHub and joined LinkFree
milestones.description: I taught myself to code, discovered EddieHub and joined LinkFree

milestones.title: Became an EddieHub 0.2 Ambassador
milestones.description: I accepted the role as EddieHub Ambassador 0.2

milestones.title: Received my first GitHub Sponsor
milestones.description: I received my first sponsorship on GitHub Sponsors
